summary: Become an integral part of company team, applying skills learned from 30+ years of managing the Wachapreague Hotel, Marina & Island House Restaurant. A self-motivated and goal-oriented professional who works well with others to plan and coordinate many aspects of on- and off-premise catering functions. Utilize experience to manage daily operations, encourage and direct staff, and develop new ideas to improve existing procedures within the facility.

experience.title: PRESIDENT
experience.description: Led hotel, marina and restaurant operations; menu development and daily menu execution; equipment maintenance; implemented employee incentive programs; ensured timely lunches and on- and off-premise catering; managed driver safety and vehicle sanitation; ensured customer service standards; developed business plans and operating budgets for restaurant construction.

experience.title: GENERAL MANAGER
experience.description: Oversee scheduling and training of 35-40 staff across marina, motel and restaurant operations; ensure high levels of customer service; manage staff coverage for events and holidays; train managers in sales growth and cost controls; develop corrective actions for customer complaints; lead budgeting and marketing initiatives.

experience.title: VENDOR & PURCHASING SUPERVISOR
experience.description: Research vendors, process credit applications, manage purchasing of food, beverage and equipment; monitor vendor performance for price, quality and service; manage food and beverage inventory; perform biweekly physical inventory and cost tracking; maintain par levels; inspect incoming shipments and storage practices.

experience.title: INSURANCE, LICENSE & PERMIT SPECIALIST
experience.description: Set up and manage insurance accounts (property, liability, workers' comp & health); file applications for business licenses, ABC license and health department permits; coordinate with tax authorities for weekly, quarterly and annual filings.

experience.title: Consultant to Owner
experience.description: Advised startup and operation of a new restaurant and catering facility; managed physical inventory; developed recipes and input them into the cost system; set up beverage program and glassware; advised on local marketing and merchandising.

experience.title: General Manager
experience.description: Hire and maintain staff; control payroll relative to budget; achieve monthly sales and expense goals; manage biweekly orders from Ace Warehouse and local vendors; process purchase orders; attend monthly GM meetings.

experience.title: Assistant Manager
experience.description: Oversee daily operations during breakfast, lunch and dinner shifts; supervise staff; ensure fast service times; align payroll with budget; conduct weekly management meetings; focus on customer service excellence and drive-through efficiency.
